languages.text: "Ха. Да, наблюдай. Вслушивайся в шепоты. Ищи меня в каждой тени. Кто знает, когда плод твоего воображения обернется твоим кошмаром".
"Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"
languages.original_text: "Ха. Да, наблюдай. Вслушивайся в шепоты. Ищи меня в каждой тени. Кто знает, когда плод твоего воображения обернется твоим кошмаром".

traits.locale_text: "Ha. Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare."
"Ha. Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare."
"Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

"Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

languages.text: "Ha! Ja, seht genau hin. Lauscht auf flüsternde Stimmen. Sucht in den Schatten nach mir. Wer weiß, wann ein Hirngespinst zu Eurem Albtraum werden könnte?"
languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Ja, seht genau hin. Lauscht auf flüsternde Stimmen. Sucht in den Schatten nach mir. Wer weiß, wann ein Hirngespinst zu Eurem Albtraum werden könnte?"

languages.text: « Ha ! C'est ça, guettez donc tout votre soûl. Écoutez les murmures. Cherchez-moi dans chaque recoin d'ombre. Qui sait quand un caprice de votre imagination pourrait devenir votre pire cauchemar ? »
languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! C'est ça, guettez donc tout votre soûl. Écoutez les murmures. Cherchez-moi dans chaque recoin d'ombre. Qui sait quand un caprice de votre imagination pourrait devenir votre pire cauchemar ? »

languages.text: «¡Ja! Sí, observa atentamente. Escucha susurros. Espérame en cualquier sombra. ¿Quién sabe cuándo tu imaginación puede ocultar tu peor pesadilla?».
languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja! Sí, observa atentamente. Escucha susurros. Espérame en cualquier sombra. ¿Quién sabe cuándo tu imaginación puede ocultar tu peor pesadilla?».

languages.text: 「ふん！そうよ、よく見なさい。囁きを聞いて。全ての影の中で私を探すの。想像がいつ悪夢に変わるか分からないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

traits.locale_text: 「ふん！そうよ、よく見なさい。囁きを聞いて。全ての影の中で私を探すの。想像がいつ悪夢に変わるか分からないでしょう？」

languages.text: “哈！很好，那就仔细看，仔细倾听那些低语，在每个阴影里寻找吧。谁知道什么时候，你的胡思乱想就会变成你的噩梦之源呢？”
languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

traits.locale_text: “哈！很好，那就仔细看，仔细倾听那些低语，在每个阴影里寻找吧。谁知道什么时候，你的胡思乱想就会变成你的噩梦之源呢？”

languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"

languages.text: "Hah! Evet, dikkatli izle. Fısıltıları dinle. Her gölgede beni ara. Hayal gücünün ne zaman seni kandırıp kâbusa dönüşeceğini kim bilebilir?"
languages.original_text: "Ha! Yes, watch carefully. Listen for whispers. Look for me in every shadow. Who knows when a trick of your imagination might become your nightmare?"
